UserProfile.title: User Profile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user's public profile information.

photoURL.description: URL of the user's profile picture.

LeaderboardEntry.title: Leaderboard Entry
LeaderboardEntry.description: Represents a single entry on the leaderboard.

displayName.description: The display name of the user for this entry.

photoURL.description: URL of the user's profile picture for this entry.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp of the last score update.

gameCode.description: A short, unique code for joining the game.

hostId.description: The UID of the user who created the game.

status.description: The current status of the duel.

players.description: An object containing the player information.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the duel was created.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores public user profile information. A user can only write to their own document.

/leaderboard/{userId}.description: Stores the highest score for each user. Publicly readable, but a user can only write to their own entry.

/duels/{duelId}.description: Stores real-time duel game sessions. Players can create, join, and update their own games.
